name: Hollywood Thief
description:
Hoolywood Thief is my end of first year game of study by 3 e-artsup students.

In Hollywood Thief, you play a thief who have to steal the script of a film. You will have to infiltrate in the office of the director. But there are gards and cameras everywhere. To win you have to be discreet and use what you see.

This game was made by Benjamin Leroy, Sebastien Lepers and Hugo Lebre.
